timeline.message:
Layers creator classes

There are still some quirks to layer creation that we will have
to work out
- includes on file patterns can end up "excluding" directories
  which will have to be readded, or we can ignore includes
  directives on directories and end up with empty directories
  everywhere
- directories between a target and root will be configured to
  have the default properties of ReproducibleLayerBuilder rather
  that what is configured by the user. This can be dealt with
  by populating directories from root.
